meanings.sent1: Trying new things imboldens me to be more adventurous.
meanings.sent2: His supportive words imboldens her to pursue her dreams.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion imboldens the timid mouse to stand up to the cat.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun imboldens the flowers to open up and greet the day.
meanings.sent5: The coach's pep talk imboldens the team to play with determination.

meanings.sent1: Seeing her smile imboldens me to keep going.
meanings.sent2: The success stories imboldens others to strive for greatness.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel imboldens the birds to join in its antics.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song imboldens the heart to dance with joy.
meanings.sent5: The majestic view from the mountaintop imboldens a sense of awe and wonder.
